comments:
Build:  TPTP-4.3.0-200610090100
- Import a log file and a symptom 2.0 file
- Open the analysis setting dialog
- Select the right combination of engines and database
- Select analyze all

Setting to P2 since it may only be containable in the second week of i3.

Created an attachment (id=52633)
Patch

More testing will be required before the patch is submitted.
Thanks to Alex for helping me in finding the root cause of the problem.
Retargeting to 4.4 since it is a major defect and it is not a must fix for 4.3
Fix checked into the HEAD stream.
